p: If instituted without enrollment time limits (Scenario 2), for the CCP intervention to become cost effective, the interventionâ€™s effect size must be increased from an RR of 1.11 to an RR of 1.47, or the year-one cost per client must be decreased by more than 72.1%, from $7,274 to $2,026, with subsequent annual costs being proportionately decreased.
